alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 17 at 11:39AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT SOUTH CENTRAL WEBER... NORTHWESTERN WASATCH...DAVIS...SALT LAKE...WESTERN SUMMIT... NORTHWESTERN UTAH AND NORTHEASTERN TOOELE COUNTIES... At 1138 AM MST...an area of heavy snow was along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Hooper to near Clive...and moving east at 45 mph. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Sandy, Layton, Murray, Bountiful, Tooele, Farmington, Grantsville, Hill Air Force Base, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Cottonwood Heights, Clearfield, Midvale, and Kaysville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 286 and 337. Interstate 84 between mile markers 86 and 90. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 42 and 139. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow. * Sudden and brief snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are expected in this area of heavy snow. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
